Text: Ok I think I have fixed it. If not you can always find my listings at Extratorrent

appreciate the effort, but the audio is completely off-sync in the pre-race, and the audio cuts out so much in the race video that it almost makes it unwatchable.

Yes I noticed that also. Sometimes when they go to commercial break the audio is fixed where the file was split. This happens when editing HD files and the encoder has stated he is experiencing problems with capture card overheating. I am just making it available, not the encoder but also appreciate the effort and understand sometimes it can be a struggle.
